translations: 分析，免疫测定（immunoassay 复数）

sentences.sentence: The platform can also concurrently perform immunoassays to detect toxins in less than 10 minutes.
sentences.translation: 同时，该平台还可以在10分钟内执行免疫测定以探测毒素。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the effects of the serum thyroxine-binding capacity on the biases in free thyroxine immunoassays.
sentences.translation: 目的研究血清甲状腺素结合能力对游离甲状腺素免疫测定法检测偏差的影响。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the application of automated microparticle enzyme immunoassays (MEIA) in liver transplantation.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨全自动快速微粒子酶免疫检测法（MEIA）在肝移植中的应用。
